meanings.definition: The wood of a cedar tree.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from cedarwoods.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of cedarwoods filled the room, bringing a sense of calm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used cedarwoods to build a tiny fort in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and rich as cedarwoods, resonating through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the cedarwoods, creating a warm and inviting glow.

meanings.definition: An area or forest of cedar trees.
meanings.sent1: The hiker explored the vast cedarwoods, marveling at the towering trees.
meanings.sent2: Birds chirped happily in the cedarwoods, creating a symphony of nature.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the cedarwoods, giggling with delight.
meanings.sent4: The cedarwoods whispered ancient stories to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight filtered through the cedarwoods, painting mystical patterns on the forest floor.
